EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal Partner Days_2017.Boston ISV Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Partner Days - Boston | Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Partner Days in Boston.
We are very excited to be hosting this event. In the past, partners who have attended the event have been able to significantly fast track their integration with the Pivotal Cloud Foundry platform. We hope you'll find it as valuable as well.
What: Pivotal Partner Days: Software Integration Workshop When: June 28-29, 2017 Where: Cambridge Innovation Center, 1 Broadway, Cambridge, MA 02142
Please review what you need to prepare and bring <[[https://pivotal.io/event/partner-days/denver/software-integration-workshop#beforeyouarrive]]> prior to the event.
Questions? Please contact Marina Joseph, Technical Program Manager, ISV Engineering, Pivotal Cloud Foundry at mjoseph@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mjoseph@pivotal.io]]>.
- Pivotal Cloud Foundry ISV Engineering Team
